Hi, I was hoping it was a bug, but it seems is probably my
configuration.

=
 

I don't understand why the client work in both machines if I connect
loc=
ally, but it fails when I try to connect in remote

I download cmd-jmxclien=
t from cvs and I run it from eclipse, but I get
the exact same exception

 =

support=
)

Asunto: [a=
rchive-crawler] Remote JMX Error

 

 

Does Any one have use cmdline-jmx f=
rom remote??

 

I can connect to the service locally but not from remote.
=

When I connect from remote I get an connect refuse from 127.0.0.1

It seem=
s that JMX Server uses another port to talk to the client, but
the client t=
ry to connect to the local machine insted of the remote.

I try also JConso=
le and it works from local but not from remote.

I have full access from th=
e client to the Server, (no firewall) tested
using telnet.

I also try usin=
g password protected, but nothing

 

It doesn't look like a client error, =


 

Could it be in Heritirx implementation of JMX? (like sending back to t=
he
client 127.0.0.1 insted of host ip)

 

 

Leandro Stasi
